Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by West Texas in 1975...
Injured on 7/5/1978 with a Tender Shoulder, out for one week...
Traded from West Texas to Wisconsin on 7/21/1979 (Going to WT: RF E. Gatson, SS G. Valls. Going to WIS: P M. Cortes, CF A. Render)...
Earned first career win on 5/4/1980...
Had first career hit on 6/29/1980, off Mark Ricks (NJ)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/9/1983, off Amanda Whurlitzer (MAN)...
